Class Fraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fraction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MixedFraction

    public class Fraction
extends java.lang.Object
    A program used to construct a fraction and perform a variety of functions to it. This includes: finding the common denominator of two numbers, reducing it to its lowest whole number terms, and displaying it. It can also perform operations on two fractions including addition, subtraction, multiplication and division.
    Author:
    Muhammad Mousa
